welcome_message: Hey, {username}! HyperSniper is live ‚Äî pick a language and start hunting alpha.
menu_hint: HyperSniper ({bot}) ‚Äî use the keyboard buttons or type a command.
hot_empty: No hot tokens right now. Scanner refreshes every 15 seconds.
gem_not_found: Token is no longer in the top. Try again later.
gem_connect_instructions: Open the Mini App and authorize via: {link}
gem_buy_failed: Failed to prepare transaction. Try again.
gem_buy_ready: Payload ready. Sign it in Ton Connect.
throttled: Too many requests. Slow down a bit.
error_generic: Temporary glitch. HyperSniper team is on it.
connect_link:
Open the Ton Connect Mini App and authorize via:
{link}
connect_token: Mini App token (JWT): {token} Keep it secret and only use it inside the app.
positions_empty: No active positions or rules yet.
gem_watch_on: Watching this token. Updates will arrive in DM.
gem_tp_hint: TP configuration UI arrives soon. For now, manage via /positions.
gem_ar_hint: Anti-rug automation ships on the next milestone.
gem_feed_on: You're now subscribed to automatic HyperSniper top updates.
gem_feed_already_off: You weren't subscribed to the top feed.
gem_filters_placeholder: Filters (min score, smart money, LP burned) arrive soon.
gem_filters_usage:
Usage: /gemfilters score=70 lp=1 smart=2 sort=volume
Current: score {score}, LP {lp}, smart {smart}, sort {sort}
gem_filters_invalid: Invalid parameters. Use score=<float>, smart=<int>, lp=0/1, sort=score|volume.
gem_filters_updated: Filters updated: score {score}, LP {lp}, smart {smart}, sort {sort}
